name: IQ Fulfillment
author: iqintegrations

sections.description:
Revolutionize Your E-Commerce Journey: Smart, Agile, and Automated Logistics with IQ

üåê Global Integration Made Simple: Seamlessly connect your sales channels, inventory tools, and shipping carriers in one centralized platform. Experience the ease of integration and eliminate manual processes for a streamlined operation.

üëÅÔ∏è Real-Time Data Visibility: Gain unprecedented clarity and control over your supply chain with real-time tracking. Ensure accuracy and transparency from inventory to shipping for informed decision-making and optimized operations.

üöÄ Seamless User Experience: Access our intuitive web application anytime, anywhere. No clunky downloads or complex installations – just a straightforward, user-friendly platform that adapts to your mobile lifestyle.

üìä Advanced Reporting & Analytics: Leverage our sophisticated tools to understand your fulfillment operations better. Smart flagging and comprehensive analytics empower you to make data-driven decisions swiftly.

üîÑ Efficient Returns Management: Simplify returns with our white-label plugin. Initiate returns directly from e-commerce channels, offering your customers a convenient and efficient process.

ü§ñ Automated Predictive Shipping: Merge foresight and efficiency with our predictive shipping and automated order routing. Stay ahead of demand and optimize delivery routes for unparalleled logistics performance.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended
  • Woocommerce plugin

Automatic installation

  • Log in to your WordPress website and navigate to the “Plugins” section in the sidebar.
  • Click on the “Add New” button.
  • Search for the “IQ Fulfillment” plugin in the search bar, and click on the “Install Now” button for the plugin you want to add.
  • Once the plugin is installed, click on the “Activate” button.
  • The plugin should now be activated and added to your website.
  • Go to the “IQ Fulfillment” manu from your admin menubar.
  • Click for integration & allow the permission.
  • Login to our system & wait for the approval.
